overview: Is all that we see or seem but a dream within a dream? Pennsylvania 1854. German immigrant John Linden is responsible for his brotherâ€™s widow Flora and her two young sons. When the little boys vanish into the mountains without a trace, the neighboring community first helps, then begins to suspect the young couple. Neither John nor Flora believe the boys are gone forever, until a brutal attack becomes a mysterious test of faith.
title: Kinderwald
